meaningMnemonic: You have an <radical>alcohol</radical> <radical>nine</radical> times stronger than any other drink in a bottle shaped like a <radical>cross</radical> and you drink it all and become <kanji>drunk</kanji>. You’re like, so drunk right now from all that alcohol. Nine times more drunk than ever before.
readingMnemonic: If you drink so much that you become <kanji>drunk</kanji>, then your alcohol will begin to taste like water. What is the reading of 水? It's <reading>すい</reading>, which is the reading for this kanji.
